trans-unit.source: To install <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> you must download the distribution and extract the package.

seg-source.mrk: To install <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> you must download the distribution and extract the package.

target.mrk: To install <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> you must download the distribution and extract the package.

trans-unit.source: There are several distributions of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, including binary and source distributions for the latest official release and for previous official releases.

seg-source.mrk: There are several distributions of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, including binary and source distributions for the latest official release and for previous official releases.

target.mrk: There are several distributions of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, including binary and source distributions for the latest official release and for previous official releases.

trans-unit.source: The bin distribution contains scripts, demonstration programs, documentation, and the optimized .jar files. These .jar files are the same set of .jar files that are in the lib distribution.

seg-source.mrk: The bin distribution contains scripts, demonstration programs, documentation, and the optimized .jar files.
These .jar files are the same set of .jar files that are in the lib distribution.

target.mrk: The bin distribution contains scripts, demonstration programs, documentation, and the optimized .jar files.
These .jar files are the same set of .jar files that are in the lib distribution.

trans-unit.source: The lib distribution contains an optimized, small footprint set of the Derby .jar files for deployment.

seg-source.mrk: The lib distribution contains an optimized, small footprint set of the Derby .jar files for deployment.

target.mrk: The lib distribution contains an optimized, small footprint set of the Derby .jar files for deployment.

trans-unit.source: The lib-debug distribution contains a larger footprint set of the Derby .jar files that are useful for debugging or reporting issues.

seg-source.mrk: The lib-debug distribution contains a larger footprint set of the Derby .jar files that are useful for debugging or reporting issues.

target.mrk: The lib-debug distribution contains a larger footprint set of the Derby .jar files that are useful for debugging or reporting issues.

trans-unit.source: The src distribution contains the source files that are used to create the bin, lib, and lib-debug distributions.

seg-source.mrk: The src distribution contains the source files that are used to create the bin, lib, and lib-debug distributions.

target.mrk: The src distribution contains the source files that are used to create the bin, lib, and lib-debug distributions.

trans-unit.source: The remainder of the instructions in this guide assume that you have downloaded the bin distribution.

seg-source.mrk: The remainder of the instructions in this guide assume that you have downloaded the bin distribution.

target.mrk: The remainder of the instructions in this guide assume that you have downloaded the bin distribution.

trans-unit.source: Navigate your Web browser to <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/derby_downloads.html" scope="external"><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#paths/pathdownload"></ph></xref>. The downloads page provides links to the distributions of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> This page also contains a link to <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/dev/derby_source.html" scope="external"><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#paths/pathsource"></ph></xref>, where you can find information on how to use the Subversion version control system to access the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> source code for a specific branch or for the development trunk.

seg-source.mrk: Navigate your Web browser to <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/derby_downloads.html" scope="external"><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#paths/pathdownload"></ph></xref>.

The downloads page provides links to the distributions of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> This page also contains a link to <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/dev/derby_source.html" scope="external"><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#paths/pathsource"></ph></xref>, where you can find information on how to use the Subversion version control system to access the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> source code for a specific branch or for the development trunk.

target.mrk: Navigate your Web browser to <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/derby_downloads.html" scope="external"><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#paths/pathdownload"></ph></xref>.

The downloads page provides links to the distributions of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> This page also contains a link to <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/dev/derby_source.html" scope="external"><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#paths/pathsource"></ph></xref>, where you can find information on how to use the Subversion version control system to access the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> source code for a specific branch or for the development trunk.

trans-unit.source: Download the ZIP or TAR archive for the distribution that you want to use.

seg-source.mrk: Download the ZIP or TAR archive for the distribution that you want to use.

target.mrk: Download the ZIP or TAR archive for the distribution that you want to use.

trans-unit.source: Extract the downloaded package. The extracted installation contains several subdirectories:

seg-source.mrk: The extracted installation contains several subdirectories:

target.mrk: The extracted installation contains several subdirectories:

trans-unit.source: The demo subdirectory contains the demonstration programs.

seg-source.mrk: The demo subdirectory contains the demonstration programs.

target.mrk: The demo subdirectory contains the demonstration programs.

trans-unit.source: The bin subdirectory contains the scripts for executing utilities and setting up the environment.

seg-source.mrk: The bin subdirectory contains the scripts for executing utilities and setting up the environment.

target.mrk: The bin subdirectory contains the scripts for executing utilities and setting up the environment.

trans-unit.source: The javadoc subdirectory contains the api documentation that was generated from source code comments.

seg-source.mrk: The javadoc subdirectory contains the api documentation that was generated from source code comments.

target.mrk: The javadoc subdirectory contains the api documentation that was generated from source code comments.

trans-unit.source: The test subdirectory contains regression tests for .

seg-source.mrk: The test subdirectory contains regression tests for .

target.mrk: The test subdirectory contains regression tests for .
